ValidationRule.description: Prevent user from going back to a previous stage on opportunity once the stage has been crossed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
CASE( StageName, 'Preselection', 1, 'Prospecting', 2, 'Qualification', 3, 'Needs Analysis', 4, 'Value Proposition', 5, 'Id. Decision Makers', 6, 'Perception Analysis', 7, 'Proposal/Price Quote', 8, 'Negotiation/Review', 9, 'Closed Won', 10, 'Closed Lost', 10, 0 )
<
CASE( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Preselection', 1, 'Prospecting', 2, 'Qualification', 3, 'Needs Analysis', 4, 'Value Proposition', 5, 'Id. Decision Makers', 6, 'Perception Analysis', 7, 'Proposal/Price Quote', 8, 'Negotiation/Review', 9, 'Closed Won', 10, 'Closed Lost', 10, 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are prohibited from going back to a previous stage on an opportunity record once you once you mark a stage as complete.
